game.name: UPBEAT
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Jump, bounce, and drum your way up an infinite climb. Build a beat, spawn platforms with your drum machine, and chain physics-powered combos to outclimb the competition in this rhythmic precision platformer.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Jump, bounce, and drum your way up an infinite climb. Build a beat, spawn platforms with your drum machine, and chain physics-powered combos to outclimb the competition in this rhythmic precision platformer.
